section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:

para.text: “Acceptable level of school attendance” means that a student has not accrued unexcused absences exceeding 5% of the total days in a school year and has not violated the requirements for mandatory school attendance under § 38-202.
“Eligible District youth” means an individual who is a domiciliary of the District and is between 14 and 19 years of age.
“Institute” means the Mayor’s Youth Leadership Institute.
